zh: 敌人从战场上狼狈逃窜。

en: The enemy flung fresh troops into the battle.
zh: 敌人又往战斗里投入了生力军。

en: The enemy dropped bombs on the factory.
zh: 敌人往工厂投了炸弹。

en: The enemy were driven out of the land.
zh: 敌人被赶出了这片土地。

en: The enemy blew up the bridge.
zh: 敌人把桥给炸了。

en: The enemy dropped many bombs on the factory.
zh: 敌人往工厂投了很多炸弹。

en: The enemy answered our fire.
zh: 敌人还击了。

en: The enemy's plane suddenly turned toward us.
zh: 敌机突然朝我们飞过来了。

en: The enemy did not yield to us.
zh: 敌人没有向我们屈服。

en: The enemy is caught like a mouse in a trap.
zh: 敌人现在是瓮中之鳖。

en: The enemy launched an attack on us.
zh: 敌人向我们发起了进攻。

en: The enemy gave in without further resistance.
zh: 敌人没怎么抵抗就投降了。

en: The enemy finally gave in.
zh: 敌人最终还是投降了。

en: The enemy occupied the fort.
zh: 敌人占领了要塞。

en: The enemy attacked the town.
zh: 敌人袭击了那个镇子。

en: The enemy made a strong attack on that building.
zh: 敌人猛攻那栋建筑。

en: They had to submit to the superior force of the enemy.
zh: 面对敌人的强大武力，他们不得不屈服。

en: Though the enemy's defenses were strong, we tried to break through.
zh: 虽然敌人的防守很严，我们还是试着突围。

en: We broke through the enemy lines.
zh: 我们突破了敌人的防线。

en: Stop the advance of the enemy.
zh: 拦住前进的敌人。

en: Stop the enemy's advancement.
zh: 阻止敌人的进攻。

en: The enemy's attack ceased at dawn.
zh: 敌人的进攻在天亮时停止了。

en: The enemy kept up their attack all day.
zh: 敌人攻了一整天。

en: The enemy attack ceased at dawn.
zh: 敌人的进攻在黎明时分停止了。

en: He is generous to his opponents.
zh: 他对对手很大方。

en: They were ready to run the risk of being shot by the enemy.
zh: 他们做好了冒着被敌人打死的风险。

en: The position held by the enemy is so important they will fight to the bitter end to hold it.
zh: 敌人占领的那个位置太重要了，他们会拼死守住。

en: We anticipated where the enemy would attack.
zh: 我们预料到了敌人会从哪儿进攻。

en: Bring the guns into play when the enemy approaches us.
zh: 等敌人靠近了再开火。

en: There is honor among thieves.
zh: 盗亦有道。

en: Two robbers broke into a store.
zh: 两个劫匪闯进了一家店。

en: We caught the thief.
zh: 我们抓住了那个小偷。

en: The convenience store employee chased the thief and was stabbed to death.
zh: 便利店店员去追小偷，结果被捅死了。

en: It's too late to shut the barn door after the horse is stolen.
zh: 亡羊补牢，为时已晚。

en: The burglar broke into the house under the cover of night.
zh: 小偷趁着夜色溜进了屋里。

en: The thief hit me and gave me a black eye and then ran off.
zh: 小偷打了我一拳，把我眼睛打青了，然后就跑了。

en: The thieves made off with the jewels.
zh: 小偷带着珠宝溜了。

en: The thief whipped out into the crowd.
zh: 小偷一下子钻进人群里不见了。

en: The thief seemed to break in through a window.
zh: 小偷好像是从窗户翻进来的。

en: Robbers prowl around at midnight.
zh: 强盗常在半夜出没。

en: The thief was marched off to the police station.
zh: 小偷被押到了派出所。

en: The thief was caught in the act.
zh: 小偷被抓了个现行。

en: The thief ran away when she saw the policeman.
zh: 小偷一见警察就跑了。

en: The thief was handed over to the police.
zh: 小偷被扭送到了警察局。

en: The thief outwitted the police and got away with his loot.
zh: 小偷耍了警察，带着赃物跑了。

en: The thief took flight when the policeman saw him.
zh: 警察一看到小偷，小偷拔腿就跑。

en: The robber ran away when the policeman saw him.
zh: 强盗看见警察就溜了。

en: The thief got in without being noticed.
zh: 小偷悄悄溜了进来。

en: The thief fled without leaving any traces.
zh: 小偷跑了，没留下一点痕迹。

en: The thief ran away in the direction of the station.
zh: 小偷朝车站方向跑了。

en: The thieves ran away after it got dark.
zh: 天黑后，小偷们就溜了。

en: The thief made off with the woman's handbag.
zh: 小偷抢了那个女人的手提包跑了。

en: The thief snatched the woman's handbag and took to his heels.
zh: 小偷抢走女人的手提包，撒腿就跑。

en: The thief slipped into the house.
zh: 小偷溜进屋里了。

en: The burglar gained access to the house through this door.
zh: 那个贼是从这扇门进屋的。

en: The burglar came into the house through this door.
zh: 那个贼是从这扇门进来的。

en: It seems that the burglar broke in through an upstairs window.
zh: 看来贼是从二楼窗户翻进来的。

en: The thief is certain to be caught eventually.
zh: 那个小偷早晚会被抓到的。

en: The thief was arrested red-handed.
zh: 小偷被抓了个现行。

en: The thief's pursuit began.
zh: 警察开始追那个小偷了。

en: Give a thief enough rope and he'll hang himself.
zh: 坏事做多了早晚得栽。

en: The robbers did away with their victims.
zh: 劫匪把受害者给害了。

en: The thieves pulled open all the drawers of the desk in search of money.
zh: 那些贼为了找钱，把书桌抽屉全翻开了。

en: A mugger robbed him of all of his money.
zh: 劫匪抢走了他身上所有的钱。

en: A thief broke in and made off with all my jewelry.
zh: 有个贼溜进来，把我所有的珠宝都偷走了。

en: The thief ran away and the policeman ran after him.
zh: 小偷拔腿就跑，警察在后面紧追不舍。

en: The burglar wore gloves, with the result that there were no finger-prints to be found.
zh: 那个贼戴了手套，所以没留下指纹。

en: A burglar made away with my wife's diamond ring.
zh: 有个贼把我老婆的钻戒给偷走了。

en: The thief cursed the police for finding him.
zh: 那个贼因为被警察抓到了，嘴里一直咒骂着。

en: A burglar broke into the house.
zh: 有个贼闯进屋里了。

en: I have no intention of getting wet.
zh: 我可不想被淋湿。

en: Clay is the essential ingredient in making pottery.
zh: 粘土是做陶器的关键原料。

en: Don't tramp in the living room with muddy feet.
zh: 别带着满脚的泥在客厅里乱踩。

en: The nail tore his jacket.
zh: 钉子把他的夹克给钩破了。

en: Mud clings to my shoes.
zh: 鞋上粘了泥。

en: Don't give up!
zh: 别放弃！

en: Don't give up.
zh: 别灰心。

en: Give it up.
zh: 放弃吧。

en: The corrected sentence was just what he wanted to say.
zh: 改完之后的句子正好就是他想说的。

en: The coxswain egged his crewmen on, and made a winning spurt at the last lap of the regatta.
zh: 舵手一直在给船员们鼓劲，最后在比赛的最后一圈成功发力赢得了胜利。

en: I'm killing myself to meet the deadline.
zh: 我为了赶截止日期真是拼了老命了。

en: I cannot agree to your proposal as regards the deadline.
zh: 关于截止日期，我没法同意你的建议。

en: She handed in her term paper after the deadline.
zh: 她的期末论文交晚了，过了截止日期才交。

en: I'm sorry for the short deadline.
zh: 抱歉，截止日期定得这么紧。

en: He was called down by his boss for missing his deadline.
zh: 他因为没按时交差，被老板给训了一顿。

en: I worked all night so to meet the deadline.
zh: 为了赶截止日期，我熬了一整夜。

en: Sadako gave a weak nod.
zh: 贞子虚弱地轻轻点了点头。

en: Sadako wanted to say more, but her mouth and tongue wouldn't move.
zh: 贞子还想多说几句，但嘴巴和舌头已经不听使唤了。

en: Sadako smiled at them.
zh: 贞子对着他们笑了笑。

en: Sadako had folded 643 paper cranes so far.
zh: 到目前为止，贞子已经折了643只千纸鹤了。

en: Quickly Sadako tried to fold the paper before she fell asleep.
zh: 贞子想在睡着前赶紧把纸折好。

en: Sadako looked at the golden paper crane that her best friend Chizuko had made for her.
zh: 贞子盯着好朋友千鹤子为她折的金色千纸鹤。

en: Sadako's friends wanted to build a monument to her and all children who were killed by the atomic bomb.
zh: 贞子的朋友们想为她和所有被原子弹炸死的孩子们建一座纪念碑。

en: Sadako wanted to forget about it.
zh: 贞子想把这事儿给忘了。

en: Is my paper looked over before submitting?
zh: 交上去之前，有人检查过我的论文了吗？

en: You must not forget to check your paper before you hand it in.
zh: 交论文之前，你可千万记得检查一遍。

en: Out of the four policies that were suggested, I think the most effective one would be the "Improvement of Preventive Care and Health Promotion" policy.
zh: 在这四个建议的政策中，我觉得“改善预防性护理和健康促进”最有效。

en: Let's join hand in hand.
zh: 让我们携手共进。

en: The section chief accepted the proposal.
zh: 科长采纳了这个提议。

en: Please compose a draft of the proposal idea.
zh: 请为这个提议写个草稿。

en: Do you mind my making a suggestion?
zh: 我能提个建议吗？

en: The familiar argument against a proposed action that it is premature.
zh: 对某项提议最常见的反对理由就是时机还不成熟。

en: It is important to overview the economic status of these groups before examining the proposed solutions.
zh: 在研究提出的解决方案之前，先了解这些群体的经济状况很重要。
